DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect Songha Night ® insomnia , anxiety quality life compare placebo patient mild moderate insomnia .
DOC.brief_title: The Ability Songha Night ® Improve Sleep Patients With Mild Moderate Sleep Disturbances
DOC.criteria: Psychophysiologic insomnia Severity : mild moderate Duration : subacute chronic Subjects age > 18 < 65 , men woman Subject give write informed consent Regular use psychoactive drug Work shift Use psychoactive drug past 30 day Any treatment might interfere his/her participation study evaluation efficacy safety test drug ( e.g . renal insufficiency , hepatic metabolic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , psychiatric disorder , myasthenia gravis , delirious state , etc . ) know hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Pregnancy , lactation , woman childbearing potential use establish contraceptive Drug alcohol abuse Participation another trial within past 30 day
